name: trustlance-backend
description: TrustLance Backend - Smart Contracts and AI Agent

scripts.deploy:amoy: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network amoy
scripts.deploy:polygon: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygon
scripts.deploy:local: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network hardhat
scripts.verify: cd backend && npx hardhat verify --network amoy
